alphabetsoup.framework
Interface Bucket

All Known Implementing Classes:
BucketAgent, BucketAgent, BucketBase
public interface Bucket

Bucket defines the interface that buckets must implement in order to properly interact within AlphabetSoup.

Author:
Chris Hazard

Method Summary
 void addLetter(Letter l)
          Adds a letter to the contents of the bucket.
 boolean containsLetter(Letter l)
          Returns true if the Bucket contains the specific reference of the Letter specified
 Letter containsMatchingLetter(Letter l)
          Returns a matching letter within the Bucket if the Bucket contains a letter that matches (color, letter) the Letter specified
 int getCapacity()
          Returns the maximum capacity of the Bucket in terms of number of Letter tiles

Method Detail

getCapacity

int getCapacity()
Returns the maximum capacity of the Bucket in terms of number of Letter tiles

Returns:
maximum number of Letter tiles bucket can store

getLetters

java.util.Collection<Letter> getLetters()
Returns a Collection of the Letters currently in the Bucket

Returns:
Collection of Letters in the bucket

addLetter

void addLetter(Letter l)
Adds a letter to the contents of the bucket. If the bucket is already at capacity, it should not be added.

Parameters:
l - reference of Letter to add to bucket

removeLetter

void removeLetter(Letter l)
Removes a Letter from the contents of the bucket. The specified letter should be a reference to a letter currently contained in the Bucket.

Parameters:
l - Reference to a Letter currently in the Bucket to be removed

containsLetter

boolean containsLetter(Letter l)
Returns true if the Bucket contains the specific reference of the Letter specified

Parameters:
l - reference of a Letter to see if it is in the bucket
Returns:
true if Letter is contained in the Bucket

containsMatchingLetter

Letter containsMatchingLetter(Letter l)
Returns a matching letter within the Bucket if the Bucket contains a letter that matches (color, letter) the Letter specified

Parameters:
l - reference of a Letter to see a match is in the bucket
Returns:
a letter reference to a match contained in the Bucket, null if no matches are found

getX

float getX()
Returns:
Returns the x.

getY

float getY()
Returns:
Returns the y.

getRadius

float getRadius()
Returns:
Returns the radius.

resetStatistics

void resetStatistics()
Clears the statistics kept.
